content.question: The cartoon suggests that the disparate groups that favored the Peopleâ€™s (Populist) Party typically shared which of the following?

choices.label: The idea that wealthy people had some obligation to help people living in poverty

content.answer: Belief in a stronger federal government role in the United States economic system

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
